/helpop alerts all the staff thats online on the whole server
like /report but /helpop is awesome if you like /report 1 guy an you want to say example /helpop i did a Wrong Report Ignore it Pls

reply_to.body: Do you mind elaborating on what this does? :<
reply_to.body_tagged: Do you mind elaborating on what this does? :<

replies.body: -1 The idea behind the command is nice, but we can't use /helpop to "fix the problem". It will be abused and will cause more problems than it will eliminate. Just recheck your report before you send it. I did in my whole avicus life about 5-10 wrong reports (out of hundreds). But now, to avoid wrong reports, I everytime recheck all suspicions before I use /report.
